categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter classes

nodes.text: The VCX-series auxiliary starfighter, also known as an Auxiliary Shuttle or an Attack Shuttle, was a short-range starfighter that was attachable to the VCX-100 light freighter manufactured by Corellian Engineering Corporation. The rebels of Lothal used a modified type of this fighter during various situations when fighting against the Empire.

The wreck of a starship similar in appearance to a VCX-series auxiliary starfighter appears in Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious. However, whether it is in fact a VCX-series auxiliary starfighter remains unconfirmed.
